name: @pollinginc/polling-sdk-js
description: JS SDK to interact with Polling.com services.

scripts.build: rm dist/* -Rf && tsc && esbuild ./dist/index.js --target=chrome58,firefox57,safari11,edge16 --minify --allow-overwrite --outfile=./dist/polling-sdk.js && mv dist/index.js dist/polling-sdk-vanilla.js

author: Polling.com
